svg.source:
Title: Istio TCP Attribute Flow [fillcolor="green", fontcolor="white"]
participant Source
Service as S [fillcolor="white"] participant Destination
Envoy Proxy as P [fillcolor="blue", fontcolor="white"] participant Mixer as M [fillcolor="blue", fontcolor="white"] participant Destination
Service as D [fillcolor="white"] # Note right of A: By listing the
 participants you can
 change their order
S->P: connect() [fillcolor="white"]
Note over P: Proxy must confirm 
 connection allowed [fillcolor="white"]
P->M: Check(CheckRequest) [color="blue"]
Note right of P: Attributes (values):
 context.protocol ("tcp")
 connection.id
 source.ip
 source.port
 source.user
 destination.uid
 destination.service
 request.time [color="blue"]
M-->P: CheckResponse [color="blue"] P->D: connect() [fillcolor="white"] D-->P: accept() [fillcolor="white"] P-->S: accept() [fillcolor="white"]
Note over S: With connection
 established,
 start sending data [fillcolor="white"]
S->P: send() [fillcolor="white"] P->D: send() [fillcolor="white"] D-->P: recv() [fillcolor="white" ] P-->S: recv() [fillcolor="white" ]
Note over S: ... [fillcolor="white"]
S->P: close() [fillcolor="white"] P->D: close() [fillcolor="white"] D-->P: close() [fillcolor="white" ] P-->S: close() [fillcolor="white" ]
P->>M: Report(ReportRequest) [color="blue"]
Note right of P: Attributes (values):
 connection.duration
 connection.id
 connection.received.bytes
 connection.received.bytes_total
 connection.sent.bytes
 connection.sent.bytes_total
 context.protocol ("tcp")
 context.time
 source.ip
 source.port
 source.user
 destination.ip
 destination.port
 destination.uid
 destination.service
 request.time [color="blue"]
M-->P: ReportResponse [color="blue"]

text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: middle; font-family: "Andale Mono", monospace; font-size: 16px;
